thread.title: Obama Says Oregon Shooting ‘Routine,’ Calls For More Gun-Safety Laws
thread.title_full: Obama Says Oregon Shooting ‘Routine,’ Calls For More Gun-Safety Laws - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Obama Says Oregon Shooting ‘Routine,’ Calls For More Gun-Safety Laws
text: President Barack Obama recently spoke about the shooting in Roseburg, Oregon, explaining that mass shootings were so frequent they were becoming routine – along with the response afterward. He called for expanded gun control measures, echoing the sentiments of the majority of Americans, but not some of the residents of Roseburg. On Thursday, Obama made...
